Package com.ammrat13.javagame.objects

Class TestMovingObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ammrat13.javagame.objects.TestMovingObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GamePlaySceneObject

    public class TestMovingObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements GamePlaySceneObject
    An object that does nothing, but it moves with keys. For testing purposes.

        public int getZ​()

        Specified by:

      • renderOffset

        public Vec renderOffset​()
        Returns the image's offset. Since images have their origin in the top-left corner, an offset is required so the object's position is at the center of the image.
        Specified by:
        renderOffset in interface GamePlaySceneObject
        Returns:
        The vector to add to to the top-left corner to get to the center

      • update

        public void update​(int dt,
                   java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> kCodes)
        This method will be used to update the object every frame.
        Specified by:
        update in interface GamePlaySceneObject
        Parameters:
        dt - The time that has passed since the last frame (ms)
        kCodes - The set of keys that are pressed down
